item.title: A02 Classification Models
item.description: The Goal The goal behind this study is to use the provided data set to identify whether a customer will subscribe to a term deposit or not. The Bank data The data used in this study was obtained from UCI website and we specifically used the Bank-full.csv dataset, to access the source of the data use the link below Link to the dataset. Getting a glimpse into the data we can see that it is composed of 45211 observations and 17 variables.
